document.full_text: afghan security forces have surrounded a government building in a volatile eastern province after at least four taliban insurgents, including suicide bombers, staged a brazen assault on sunday, government officials said.
document.title: police surround compound in east afghanistan siege
lines_and_colors: afghan security forces have surrounded a government building in a volatile eastern province after at least four taliban insurgents, including suicide bombers, staged a brazen assault on sunday, government officials said.
